text: 1. We are freeeezing at the beach right now in the wackiest rainiest cold and windy weather. I keep saying “but it’s still the beach!” 2. Also making my kids eat lots of fried clams by telling them they are beach fries. 3. I need these key lime pie bars. 4. You know you’re an adult when the biggest flex on vacation is having a washing machine. 5. Speaking of: a snob’s guide to the jersey shore. 6. The cumulative effect of daily actions. 7. TV things!! Loved this season of Ginny and Georgia so much! 8. The out of touch adults guide to kid culture. Why am I so old? The worst part is that you’ve witnessed me get old
html:
1. We are freeeezing at the beach right now in the wackiest rainiest cold and windy weather. I keep saying “but it’s still the beach!”

2. Also making my kids eat lots of fried clams by telling them they are beach fries.

3. I need these key lime pie bars.

4. You know you’re an adult when the biggest flex on vacation is having a washing machine.

5. Speaking of: a snob’s guide to the jersey shore.

6. The cumulative effect of daily actions.

7. TV things!! Loved this season of Ginny and Georgia so much!

8. The out of touch adults guide to kid culture. Why am I so old? The worst part is that you’ve witnessed me get old
